Changelog
=========

All notable changes to AWS Security Group Mapper will be documented in this file.

[0.1.0] - 2025-01-16
--------------------

Initial release with core functionality:

Added
~~~~~
- Basic security group mapping functionality
- Support for multi-region analysis
- Interactive Plotly visualization
- Static Matplotlib visualization
- Cross-VPC relationship highlighting
- Automated cleanup scripts
- Comprehensive documentation
- Contribution guidelines

Changed
~~~~~~~
- Improved project structure
- Enhanced error handling
- Optimized cache handling

Fixed
~~~~~
- Directory structure organization
- Documentation generation
- Build process cleanup

[Unreleased]
------------

Planned features and improvements:
- Additional visualization options
- Performance optimizations
- Extended AWS resource support
- Enhanced CIDR block handling
